topics.topic_title: Buyuke Bwalamata ku Biñambwanembwa (Understanding Literature Concepts)

sub_topics.title: Kulumbulula kyambo kya biñambwanembwa (Defining the concept of literature)
competences: Kulumbulula mwatala kyambo kya biñambwanembwa mwapusanapusana (Define the term literature in various ways)

instructional_blocks.hook: Muntu umo walengele kikope pa selechi, mukwabo wanembele kyambo pakipabi bakaili baimbile lwimbo wantanda. Jibumba ja makayo najo jakaile kisela kisekesha kubanteleki. Ñanyi jizhina jafwainwa kupanyiwa ku mingilo yonse yatelaulwa mukano ka jishimikila?

Akambizhe bafunda besambepo babiji-babiji
Akambezhe bafunda kupana mikumbu yabo

Abule bafunda amba kyambno kya biñambwanembwa kechi kyapele kwikilumbulula na bulumbuluzhi bumo ine mambo kechi kya shinkamana pa kiintu kimo ine. Nanchi kuji bulumbuluzhi bukwabo byafwainwa kuyukanyikwa
Kukambizha bafunda kunemba bulumbuluzhi bwa biñambwanembwa

instructional_blocks.short_notes: Biñambwanembwa (Literature) is a broad concept that encompasses various forms of written and oral expression. It includes narratives, poetry, drama, and other creative works that convey meaning, ideas, and cultural values.

sub_topics.short_notes: Introduction to understanding the concept of literature through student exploration and discussion of various definitions.

vocabulary.definition: Literature - creative works written or spoken that convey meaning and cultural values

questions: Kulumbulula kyambo kya biñambwanembwa

sub_topics.short_notes: Biñambwañambwa byafwainwa kunembwa, kwambiwa nangwa bunkaizhi. Main categories include: bichomeko (riddles), bishimpi (proverbs), nyimbo (songs), bishimi/mashimikila (stories), makayokayo (drama), and tubishimi (fables).
